text:
Having unrelatedly read Schedule 1 this week, can confirm broad drafting.#CAMR
"After realizing the #PatentAct list included “diphtheria vaccine” & “hepatitis B vaccine” without getting into more specifics, [#Biolyse] is hoping to just get “#COVID19 #vaccine” added to that list". https://t.co/wcmAC5jdML https://t.co/7Fx77Mu7xD
